modName: Nord resist changes  to 25 resist frost or 50 stamina
summary: Quick and simple mod by request, changes Nord racial bonus.  Two ESPs, one at half (25%) of original frost resistance, and one that removes frost resistance and grants +50 Stamina for a more lore-friendly alteration.
descriptionHtml:
Really a quick and simple alteration by request from R/SKYRIMMODS on reddit.  Shameless plug, seeing as I\'m a moderator and all, but a great community.  If this interests you please let me know, quick fixes like this I\'m happy to help out with if I can.  

The primary purpose of this mod is to both balance out the advantage Nords have over frost spells.  Considering the vast majority of Skyrim is of Nord descent it makes frost spells much less effective overall.  I tried to keep the options lore friendly.

***Friendly reminder***  though I figured it was somewhat intuitive, I should post here JIC that you should only use one ESP at a time.  

Thank you for downloading, please enjoy responsibly, this is really a simple mod so I would just ask that if you (for some reason don\'t want to take 5 minutes to do it) want to distribute or use it in another mod just throw my name in there somewhere.  I\'d appreciate it :D
author: Bucky_Ohare

files.name: Nord Resist change 50 stamina bonus no frost resist
files.fileName: Nord Resist change 50 stamina bonus no frost resist-12158-1-00.7z
